{"campaigns": [{"id": "test102", "campaignId": "test102", "name": "Hi Shasank", "subject": "Hi Shasank", "body": "Hi Shasank, this is a test email.", "bodyTemplate": "Hi Shasank, this is a test email.", "status": "completed", "createdAt": "2026-01-05T00:35:08.064956", "images": [], "totalRecipients": 0, "sentCount": 0, "failedCount": 0}, {"id": "1764449309406", "campaignId": "1764449309406", "name": "Excited to join the Interon team!", "subject": "Excited to join the Interon team!", "body": "Dear {firstName},

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to reach out and express my excitement about joining the Interon team!

As a new member, I'm looking forward to meeting everyone and contributing to our shared goals. I've heard great things about the company culture and innovative projects, and I can't wait to dive in.

If you have any tips or advice for a newcomer, I'd love to hear them. Feel free to drop by my desk or send me a message anytime.

Looking forward to working together!

Best regards,
{firstName} {lastName}", "bodyTemplate": "Dear {firstName},

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to reach out and express my excitement about joining the Interon team!

As a new member, I'm looking forward to meeting everyone and contributing to our shared goals. I've heard great things about the company culture and innovative projects, and I can't wait to dive in.

If you have any tips or advice for a newcomer, I'd love to hear them. Feel free to drop by my desk or send me a message anytime.

Looking forward to working together!

Best regards,
{firstName} {lastName}", "status": "completed", "createdAt": "2026-01-05T00:35:08.064953", "images": [], "totalRecipients": 0, "sentCount": 0, "failedCount": 0}, {"id": "1764187591054", "campaignId": "1764187591054", "name": "hi wassup test 111------- 3:06 pm", "subject": "hi wassup test 111------- 3:06 pm", "body": "hi , wassup", "bodyTemplate": "hi , wassup", "status": "completed", "createdAt": "2026-01-05T00:35:08.064949", "images": [], "totalRecipients": 0, "sentCount": 0, "failedCount": 0}, {"id": "1766597418206", "campaignId": "1766597418206", "name": "Software Engineer Position", "subject": "Software Engineer Position", "body": "We are looking for experienced developers with Python skills.", "bodyTemplate": "We are looking for experienced developers with Python skills.", "status": "completed", "createdAt": "2026-01-05T00:35:08.064945", "images": [], "totalRecipients": 0, "sentCount": 0, "failedCount": 0}, {"id": "1764528450872", "campaignId": "1764528450872", "name": "Christmas is Coming: Get Ready with {company}", "subject": "Christmas is Coming: Get Ready with {company}", "body": "Hello {firstName} {lastName},

The most wonderful time of the year is just around the corner, and {company} is gearing up to make it extra special for you.

We're putting the finishing touches on our Christmas preparations, which include:

1. Curated gift selections for all your loved ones
2. Festive decorations to transform your space
3. Holiday-themed services to ease your seasonal stress

Keep an eye on your inbox for our official holiday launch – you won't want to miss what we have in store!

Best wishes,
The {company} Team", "bodyTemplate": "Hello {firstName} {lastName},

The most wonderful time of the year is just around the corner, and {company} is gearing up to make it extra special for you.

We're putting the finishing touches on our Christmas preparations, which include:

1. Curated gift selections for all your loved ones
2. Festive decorations to transform your space
3. Holiday-themed services to ease your seasonal stress

Keep an eye on your inbox for our official holiday launch – you won't want to miss what we have in store!

Best wishes,
The {company} Team", "status": "completed", "createdAt": "2026-01-05T00:35:08.064938", "images": [], "totalRecipients": 0, "sentCount": 0, "failedCount": 0}, {"id": "1764448132810", "campaignId": "1764448132810", "name": "Grateful for you this Thanksgiving, {firstName}!", "subject": "Grateful for you this Thanksgiving, {firstName}!", "body": "Dear {firstName},

As we approach this special time of year, I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt gratitude for you. Your friendship/support/partnership has been a true blessing, and I'm thankful for all the wonderful memories we've shared.

I hope this Thanksgiving brings you and your loved ones together for a day filled with warmth, laughter, and delicious food. May your home be filled with the aroma of roasting turkey and the sweet scent of pumpkin pie!

Wishing you a joyful and abundant Thanksgiving celebration.

With gratitude,
{firstName} {lastName}", "bodyTemplate": "Dear {firstName},

As we approach this special time of year, I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt gratitude for you. Your friendship/support/partnership has been a true blessing, and I'm thankful for all the wonderful memories we've shared.

I hope this Thanksgiving brings you and your loved ones together for a day filled with warmth, laughter, and delicious food. May your home be filled with the aroma of roasting turkey and the sweet scent of pumpkin pie!

Wishing you a joyful and abundant Thanksgiving celebration.

With gratitude,
{firstName} {lastName}", "status": "completed", "createdAt": "2026-01-05T00:35:08.064935", "images": [], "totalRecipients": 0, "sentCount": 0, "failedCount": 0}, {"id": "1767515121682", "campaignId": "1767515121682", "name": "Nothing", "subject": "Nothing", "body": "hI", "bodyTemplate": "hI", "status": "completed", "createdAt": "2026-01-05T00:35:08.064932", "images": [], "totalRecipients": 0, "sentCount": 0, "failedCount": 0}, {"id": "1764522007263", "campaignId": "1764522007263", "name": "Christmas Closure Notice - {company}", "subject": "Christmas Closure Notice - {company}", "body": "Dear Valued Team Member,

As we near the end of another successful year, I am writing to inform you about our upcoming Christmas holiday schedule.

{company} will be closed from December 24th through December 26th in observance of Christmas. This time off is an opportunity for all of us to rest, recharge, and enjoy the holiday season with our families.

Please make necessary arrangements to complete any pending tasks before December 23rd. If you anticipate any critical issues during the closure, please inform your supervisor immediately.

Regular business hours will resume on December 27th.

Thank you for your hard work and dedication throughout the year. Enjoy your well-deserved break!

Happy Holidays,
{firstName} {lastName}
Human Resources Manager
{company}", "bodyTemplate": "Dear Valued Team Member,

As we near the end of another successful year, I am writing to inform you about our upcoming Christmas holiday schedule.

{company} will be closed from December 24th through December 26th in observance of Christmas. This time off is an opportunity for all of us to rest, recharge, and enjoy the holiday season with our families.

Please make necessary arrangements to complete any pending tasks before December 23rd. If you anticipate any critical issues during the closure, please inform your supervisor immediately.

Regular business hours will resume on December 27th.

Thank you for your hard work and dedication throughout the year. Enjoy your well-deserved break!

Happy Holidays,
{firstName} {lastName}
Human Resources Manager
